#hero_explain_1: Building tech products that will have high impact.
#hero_explain_2: We're passionate about building products with technology.
#our_stack: Rails 7 with Hotwire’s Turbo and Stimulus
#stack_text: Rails 7 takes advantage of the advancements in browser support for ES6/ESM, widespread adoption of HTTP/2 to deliver a no-Node default approach to front end without sacrificing interactivity and code cleanness. It’s the fulfillment of a vision to present a truly full-stack approach to web development that tackles both the front- and back-end challenges. All these are accomplished while keeping rails speed and cleanness of development.
#contact_text: We’d love to hear your ideas and share ours
#team_role: I help startups with tools and processes to better validate hypothesis, their business model and strategy
#team_description: Creative thinker with expertise in technology products and business development. Learning sustainable innovation. I actively work in:
#team_skills_4: Remote agile software development: extensive experience with tools to work with remote software teams.
#team_skills_5: Research and development: Ability to understand and apply leading edge technologies.
#team_skills_6: Team Work: Worked in many multidisciplinary teams that have led me to perceive team work extremely well.
#team_skills_7: Work well under pressure: Ability to have a clear mind at all times, even with deadlines and control points.
